description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,417); on the left two ornate belt buckles; in the center two women shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; on the right a man in pink breeches, a patterned vest, and a red coat holding a black hat and a walking stick
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Vingt-quatrième Cahier, 21 Juillet 1789
